content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Second stone furnace at position (42.0, -79.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Second stone furnace (position (42.0, -79.0))

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace is empty or contains the correct type of ore before attempting to insert a different type. In this case, the furnace cannot contain both copper ore and iron ore simultaneously.

### Errors when extracting items from the furnace
- Verify that the furnace contains the item you are attempting to extract. If there is no copper ore in the second furnace, extraction will fail.

### Errors when crafting items
- Ensure that you have the required materials in your inventory before attempting to craft items.
